audience.externalId.description: Select the audience for this campaign.Tracking the target audience is useful for media marketing without a clear list of recipients.You can create new campaign audience records at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNAUDIENCE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNAUDIENCE_> > Campaign Audiences > New.
audience.externalId.name: audience.externalId

audience.internalId.description: Select the audience for this campaign.Tracking the target audience is useful for media marketing without a clear list of recipients.You can create new campaign audience records at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNAUDIENCE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNAUDIENCE_> > Campaign Audiences > New.
audience.internalId.name: audience.internalId

audience.name.description: Select the audience for this campaign.Tracking the target audience is useful for media marketing without a clear list of recipients.You can create new campaign audience records at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNAUDIENCE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNAUDIENCE_> > Campaign Audiences > New.
audience.name.name: audience.name

baseCost.description: Enter the cost of this campaign apart from the cost of any specific campaign events.The base cost is added to the cost of individual campaign events to determine the total cost of the campaign.
baseCost.name: baseCost

campaignId.description: The campaign ID is determined in one of the following ways:    * If you use auto-generated numbers for campaigns, this ID is generated when you save the campaign.    * If you do not use auto-generated numbers for campaigns, enter a campaign ID.Campaign IDs make it easier to identify campaigns on reports and lists.
campaignId.name: campaignId

category.externalId.description: Select the category this campaign belongs in.Campaign categories are used to group campaigns on reports and lists.You can create new campaign categories at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNCATEGORY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNCATEGORY_> > Campaign Categories > New.
category.externalId.name: category.externalId

category.internalId.description: Select the category this campaign belongs in.Campaign categories are used to group campaigns on reports and lists.You can create new campaign categories at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNCATEGORY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNCATEGORY_> > Campaign Categories > New.
category.internalId.name: category.internalId

category.name.description: Select the category this campaign belongs in.Campaign categories are used to group campaigns on reports and lists.You can create new campaign categories at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNCATEGORY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNCATEGORY_> > Campaign Categories > New.
category.name.name: category.name

convCostPerCustomer.description: The cost per customer conversion for this campaign is calculated here.This is calculated by dividing the cost of the campaign by the number of transactions entered with this campaign's promotion code.
convCostPerCustomer.name: convCostPerCustomer

conversions.description: This is the number of leads or prospects that have become customers as a result of this campaign.
conversions.name: conversions

cost.description: This cost is calculated by adding the base cost of the campaign to the cost of each individual campaign event. You cannot edit the amount in this field.This amount is deducted from the revenue generated by this campaign to determine the return on investment.
cost.name: cost

costPerCustomer.description: The cost per new customer for this campaign is calculated here.Cost per customer is calculated by dividing the total cost of the campaign by the number of new customers your business gained as a result of this campaign.The number of new customers is calculated by counting the transactions entered with this campaign's promotion code.
costPerCustomer.name: costPerCustomer

customForm.externalId.description: Select the campaign form you want to use.To create a custom campaign form, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_CUSTENTRYFORM_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_CUSTENTRYFORM_> > Entry Forms or select –New–.
customForm.externalId.name: customForm.externalId

customForm.internalId.description: Select the campaign form you want to use.To create a custom campaign form, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_CUSTENTRYFORM_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_CUSTENTRYFORM_> > Entry Forms or select –New–.
customForm.internalId.name: customForm.internalId

customForm.name.description: Select the campaign form you want to use.To create a custom campaign form, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_CUSTENTRYFORM_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_CUSTENTRYFORM_> > Entry Forms or select –New–.
customForm.name.name: customForm.name

endDate.description: Enter or select the date this campaign ends.
endDate.name: endDate

expectedRevenue.description: Enter the amount of revenue that is predicted that this marketing campaign will generate.
expectedRevenue.name: expectedRevenue

family.externalId.description: Select the family of keywords this campaign keyword is a part of.Keyword families are larger groupings of paid keywords. You can create a keyword family at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > Campaign Families > New.
family.externalId.name: family.externalId

family.internalId.description: Select the family of keywords this campaign keyword is a part of.Keyword families are larger groupings of paid keywords. You can create a keyword family at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > Campaign Families > New.
family.internalId.name: family.internalId

family.name.description: Select the family of keywords this campaign keyword is a part of.Keyword families are larger groupings of paid keywords. You can create a keyword family at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > Campaign Families > New.
family.name.name: family.name

isInactive.description: This field is false by default.
isInactive.name: isInactive

keyword.description: Enter the paid keyword you are tracking with this campaign.
keyword.name: keyword

leadsGenerated.description: This is the number of new leads generated by this campaign.
leadsGenerated.name: leadsGenerated

message.description: Enter a description for this campaign.This description only appears on the campaign record.
message.name: message

offer.externalId.description: Select an offer you want to associate with this campaign.You can create new campaign offers at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNOFFER_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNOFFER_> > Offers > New.
offer.externalId.name: offer.externalId

offer.internalId.description: Select an offer you want to associate with this campaign.You can create new campaign offers at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNOFFER_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNOFFER_> > Offers > New.
offer.internalId.name: offer.internalId

offer.name.description: Select an offer you want to associate with this campaign.You can create new campaign offers at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNOFFER_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNOFFER_> > Offers > New.
offer.name.name: offer.name

owner.externalId.description: Select the campaign manager for his campaign.The campaign manager receives a notification email message when a campaign event is delivered successfully.
owner.externalId.name: owner.externalId

owner.internalId.description: Select the campaign manager for his campaign.The campaign manager receives a notification email message when a campaign event is delivered successfully.
owner.internalId.name: owner.internalId

owner.name.description: Select the campaign manager for his campaign.The campaign manager receives a notification email message when a campaign event is delivered successfully.
owner.name.name: owner.name

profit.description: This is the profit earned by this campaign. Profit is calculated by deducting the cost of the campaign from the total revenue.
profit.name: profit

promotionCode.externalId.description: Select a promotion code that you want to associate with this campaign. You must instruct the recipients of your marketing message to enter this code on transactions in your Web store.Promotion codes allow you to offer discounts through your campaigns.You can create new promotion codes at <_TABNAME=EDIT_REFERRALCODE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_REFERRALCODE_> > Promotion Codes > New.
promotionCode.externalId.name: promotionCode.externalId

promotionCode.internalId.description: Select a promotion code that you want to associate with this campaign. You must instruct the recipients of your marketing message to enter this code on transactions in your Web store.Promotion codes allow you to offer discounts through your campaigns.You can create new promotion codes at <_TABNAME=EDIT_REFERRALCODE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_REFERRALCODE_> > Promotion Codes > New.
promotionCode.internalId.name: promotionCode.internalId

promotionCode.name.description: Select a promotion code that you want to associate with this campaign. You must instruct the recipients of your marketing message to enter this code on transactions in your Web store.Promotion codes allow you to offer discounts through your campaigns.You can create new promotion codes at <_TABNAME=EDIT_REFERRALCODE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_REFERRALCODE_> > Promotion Codes > New.
promotionCode.name.name: promotionCode.name

roi.description: The return on investment of this campaign is calculated here.Return on investment is calculated by deducting the cost of the campaign from the total revenue generated and dividing the difference by the campaign's cost.
roi.name: roi

searchEngine.externalId.description: Select the search engine you purchased this keyword from.You can create new search engine records at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNSEARCHENGINE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNSEARCHENGINE_> > Campaign Search Engines > New.
searchEngine.externalId.name: searchEngine.externalId

searchEngine.internalId.description: Select the search engine you purchased this keyword from.You can create new search engine records at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNSEARCHENGINE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNSEARCHENGINE_> > Campaign Search Engines > New.
searchEngine.internalId.name: searchEngine.internalId

searchEngine.name.description: Select the search engine you purchased this keyword from.You can create new search engine records at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNSEARCHENGINE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNSEARCHENGINE_> > Campaign Search Engines > New.
searchEngine.name.name: searchEngine.name

startDate.description: Enter or select the date this campaign begins.
startDate.name: startDate

title.description: Enter a title for this campaign.You can enter up to 99 characters in this field.
title.name: title

totalRevenue.description: This field shows the total sales of transactions associated with this campaign.
totalRevenue.name: totalRevenue

type.value.description: Select the family of keywords this campaign keyword is a part of.Keyword families are larger groupings of paid keywords. You can create a keyword family at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNFAMILY_> > Campaign Families > New.
type.value.name: type.value

uniqueVisitors.description: This is the number of unique visitors that have visited your website as a result of this campaign.
uniqueVisitors.name: uniqueVisitors

url.description: Enter the URL for the campaign landing page or online customer form associated with this campaign.If you enter a campaign ID or if you autonumber your campaigns, NetSuite automatically appends the URL to include the leadsource parameter. This is the destination URL you provide to search engine services for paid keywords.
url.name: url

vertical.externalId.description: Select the market vertical you are targeting with this campaign.You can create new verticals at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNVERTICAL_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNVERTICAL_> > Campaign Verticals > New.
vertical.externalId.name: vertical.externalId

vertical.internalId.description: Select the market vertical you are targeting with this campaign.You can create new verticals at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNVERTICAL_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNVERTICAL_> > Campaign Verticals > New.
vertical.internalId.name: vertical.internalId

vertical.name.description: Select the market vertical you are targeting with this campaign.You can create new verticals at <_TABNAME=EDIT_CAMPAIGNVERTICAL_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_CAMPAIGNVERTICAL_> > Campaign Verticals > New.
vertical.name.name: vertical.name
